properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior.
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat. The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher and a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden.
A spacious four bedroom detached house with a large garden, garage and modern kitchen located in a quiet residential area close to schools and transport links.
A modern one bedroom flat ideal for first-time buyers, featuring an open plan living area, balcony and excellent transport connections.
Well-presented three bedroom house offering spacious accommodation, private driveway, and a landscaped rear garden, ideal for family living.
Two bedroom purpose-built flat with allocated parking, lift access, and a spacious living room close to local amenities.
An impressive five bedroom executive home featuring a double garage, ensuite bedrooms, and open-plan family living spaces.
A bright and spacious two bedroom flat featuring a private entrance, rear garden access and a modern bathroom.
A well-maintained three bedroom terraced house with loft potential, conservatory and off-street parking.
